name: Click Four Cats
description:
Pawlickers presents the provocative first installment of the clickFourcats franchise.

Get to the disco. With cats. Click the cats.

Edit: Lawyers have contacted us and if abbreviated this game must be referred to as cfourc, as distinct from c4c.

Credits:

  • Landon Fowles - Programming & Cat Wrangler
  • Josie - 3d Artist & Writing
  • Sean Parkinson - Audio
  • Ghabriel Frattari - 2d Art
  • Pali - Idea Greenlighter
  • Spacey3d - (some art and audio)
